name: Account Registration
description: As a user, I want to be able to register an account so I can do cool things.

name: Account Login
description: As a user, I want to be able to log into my account so I can do cool things.

name: Facebook Login
description: As a user, I want to be able to connect my Facebook account to this login so I can login with my Facebook account and do cool things.

name: Twitter Login
description: As a user, I want to be able to connect my Twitter account to this login so I can login with my Twitter account and do cool things.

name: Github Login
description: As a user, I want to be able to connect my Github account to this login so I can login with my Github account and do cool things.

name: Google Login
description: As a user, I want to be able to connect my Google account to this login so I can login with my Google account and do cool things.

name: Linked In Login
description: As a user, I want to be able to connect my LinkedIn account to this login so I can login with my LinkedIn account and do cool things.

name: Logout
description: As a user, I want to be able to logout so nobody else with access my account when I'm not around.

name: See My User Profile
description: As a user, I want to be able to view my personal user profile

name: Update My Description
description: As a user, I want to be able to the description in my profile so I can lie to impress others.

name: Upload My Picture
description: As a user, I want to be able to upload a picture for my profile so I can express my individuality or make people think I'm thinner and more attractive than I really am.

name: Link to my website
description: As a user, I want to be able to link to my own website so other people can visit it and write earth shattering stuff like FIRST on the amazing things I write.

name: Social Account Sharing
description: As a user, I want to be able to control if people can see my social networking details or not.
